attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: badgers should not be kulled to prevent the spread of T.B to cattle , instead we should be looking into more animal friendly options , perhaps we could put bait down containing  antibiotics which would cure the badgers of the disease and in turn stop the spread to cattle

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
